venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Celebrate Spring and taste wines of the world. Guests will be given a passport (event layout) to travel to different regions around the world and taste wines from each. Light appetizers are available (I recommend eating before you arrive). Guests will also enjoy great music.This is always a fun event. All guests are entered to win great items valued at over $1,000.
You must get your tickets in advance! Get your tickets at:

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/beg.php?Clk=3703858

Look forward to seeing you!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at the Project Smile silent auction tables. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Spring Wine Fest
